headline: Medtronic Faces Antitrust Hit While Betting On Stealth AXiS Growth
summary: Medtronic (NYSE:MDT) recently lost a major antitrust lawsuit that resulted in a multi hundred million dollar damages award against the company. In a separate development, Medtronic announced FDA clearance for its Stealth AXiS surgical system, a next generation spine surgery platform. The Stealth AXiS system integrates planning, navigation, robotics and real time patient alignment tracking for spine procedures. Medtronic is a large medical technology company with a broad portfolio across...
